sentences.en: And so let freedom ring from the prodigious hilltops of New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 因此,让自由之声响彻新罕布什尔州的巍峨高峰!

sentences.en: Four years ago, he was a write-in candidate in New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 4年前，他是新罕布什尔州一名非推荐候选人。

sentences.en: He is now working freelance from his home in Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 他现在在汉普郡的家里从事自由职业工作。

sentences.en: He was consultant rheumatologist at the Royal Hampshire Hospital.
sentences.cn: 他是皇家汉普郡医院的风湿病学顾问。

sentences.en: His presidential hopes suffered a fatal blow in New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 他做总统的梦想在新汉普史尔遭到了严重打击.

sentences.en: Iowa and New Hampshire are not doomed to obscurity quite yet.
sentences.cn: 然而,爱荷华和新罕布什尔的地位也并非注定黯淡.

sentences.en: It'seems as if all of New Hampshire is looking for Patty.
sentences.cn: 仿佛整个新罕布什尔州都在寻找帕蒂.

sentences.en: Only in 1809, when she returned to Hampshire and settled in the cottage on the Chawton estate of her brother Edward, could she devote herself to her work again.
sentences.cn: 在那儿，写作几不可能。 直到1809年，她回到汉普郡，安置在兄长爱德华在查顿的一所小屋中，才能够再次全心投入到自己的工作中去。

sentences.en: So let freedom ring from the prodigious hilltops of New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 所以,让自由的回声响彻新罕布什尔州连绵不绝的山头吧!

sentences.en: Someone will have to break the news to Iowa and New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 不过这样一来,就必须有人把坏消息带到爱荷华州和新罕布什尔州.

sentences.en: The garden is in a beautiful situation on top of a fold in the rolling Hampshire landscape.
sentences.cn: 这座花园位于地势连绵起伏的汉普郡的一处山岗上，环境十分优美。

sentences.en: The president may get a frosty reception in New Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 总统在新罕布什尔州可能会受到冷遇。

sentences.en: There were some " middling - great " New Hampshire men in the early days of the republic.
sentences.cn: 共和国初期新罕布什尔倒是出现过一些 “ 中不溜的伟大 ” 人物.

sentences.en: They drove across the river to New Hampshire on a hot tar road.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着一条滚烫的柏油路开过了河，来到新罕布什尔州。

sentences.en: Using an alias, he had rented a house in Fleet, Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 他用化名在汉普郡的舰队街租了间房子。

sentences.en: We lost the New Hampshire primary.
sentences.cn: 我们在新罕布什尔州的初选失利了.

trans.tran_cn: 汉普郡（英国南部之一郡）
